title: Measure_Current
description: Provides a context for scripts that perform DC get operations. This context is typically used for scripts that need to set outputs and acquire data points from instruments in a coordinated way.

sampleRate.description: Sampling rate in Hz. Defines the rate at which waveform data is sampled during acquisition.

returns.description: List of MeasurementResponse with a numeric value in nA.

allOf.description: Annotates the concrete type of the MeasurementResponse value
